Posts.Content: Hello I am new to the groups, but I need some advice. I had stage 3C hormone positive lobular breast cancer 8 years ago. I am now getting very sore ribs, at the sides but also at the back. I’m petrified that it’s bone cancer and I don’t know what to do. I have also got post mastectomy pain syndrome, so I don’t know if that is connected? Any advice would be very much appreciated!
Posts.Title: Secondary Scare
